
---
title: '华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/89ccf77c-623b-437e-9836-3cbc9238c7e6.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1478'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 30 Jul 2022 00:47:57 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/89ccf77c-623b-437e-9836-3cbc9238c7e6.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1478'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="6d05"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 7 月 30 日消息，华为今日宣布，HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵将于 7 月 30 日 10:08 正式开售，可以追踪物品位置，轻松解决寻物困扰。让心爱之物有迹可循。</p><p data-vmark="dead">IT之家了解到，HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵单个 99 元，四件组合装 299 元，皮革钥匙扣 69 元。</p><p data-vmark="880e" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/89ccf77c-623b-437e-9836-3cbc9238c7e6.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1478" w="1080" h="1946" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/89ccf77c-623b-437e-9836-3cbc9238c7e6.jpg 2x" width="1080" height="1478" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="f281">华为于 7 月 4 日发布了旗下首个防丢产品 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵，采用纯白配色，形状不是常规圆形。</p><p data-vmark="349d" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/daa2fcc4-cf40-4ab8-95c0-4d6ca550c552.png" w="812" h="753" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="812" height="753" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="5bb4">据官方介绍，HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵重量为 6g，厚度为 5.6mm，支持近场查找技术，最大 92 分贝响铃，物品遗落后可快速弹窗提醒。</p><p data-vmark="60df" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/99106c3a-45d0-4212-b318-95fd6d0bad97.png" w="843" h="524" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="843" height="510" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="10ee" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/a0852ed9-a5fc-4aa2-a3a7-e39dea2df7f0.png" w="848" h="714" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="848" height="690" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7900" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/cb404eb0-b18c-4fbb-bb53-95d43629029f.png" w="839" h="553" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="839" height="540" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="9a4c">HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵也支持远距离寻物，通过华为“查找”网络进行远程定位，通过数亿华为设备帮助定位。</p><p data-vmark="cfe0" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/69ded86a-170e-44cf-a3ac-41157ef47efc.png" w="833" h="592" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="833" height="583" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="cfcb">隐私方面，HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵支持位置信息加密上报，可双向匿名，并拥有陌生 HUAWEI Tag 长时间伴随安全提醒功能，防止其他人跟踪。</p><p data-vmark="0914" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/0bce69c5-bb18-4f55-98f4-72a0d3d5eda8.png" w="844" h="562" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="844" height="546" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="30c8">此外，HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵支持 IP67 级防尘防水，一颗电池续航一年以上，还可选配皮革钥匙扣。</p><p data-vmark="060c" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/01d2ea60-d9fa-4994-85b2-28483ad58006.png" w="851" h="1063" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" width="851" height="1024" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100032238345"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/59020/31/21625/55827/62e0a82bEae6818ad/6a7218188adb9409.jpg" title="华为 HUAWEI Tag 防丢精灵今日开售，99 元起" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> HUAWEI Tag 追踪器</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 99 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
